detectors.description: AirDropContract.drop(address,address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#26-51) has external calls inside a loop: require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,recipients[i],amounts[i])) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#46)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in AirDropContract.drop(address,address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#26-51):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(msg.sender) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#36)
	- allowance = token.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#37)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,recipients[i],amounts[i])) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#46)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- AirDropped(recipients[i],amounts[i]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDropContract.sol#48)
